name: A date with destiny
description:
Made for GMTK Jam 2019 - Theme Only One - By Connor Thompson

How to play

Controls:

Drag and drop cards onto the portrait on the right side of the screen

Gameplay:

Use the cards from your hand to discover your perfect match's likes and dislikes. 

Each card has a type. Take extra heart points from
your date by finding out what type they are weak to.

But beware, you can only play 1 card at a time before your hand gets discarded so make sure to remember what they like! Win by charming your opponent out of heart points.
